CN.content:

2. DPP (Diacetylene-Phenylene-Polyene)

Sure, my apologies. Here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. TPD (Thienyl-Polyene-Dione)
2. DPP (Diacetylene-Phenylene-Polyene)

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "symmetric" and "electron-deficient", do not directly refer to material properties and are therefore not relevant in this context.
